name: Pocket Rocket
description: Pocket Rocket is a Web3 space-themed Telegram game built by Whitechain (EVM, Layer 1 blockchain platform of WhiteBIT exchange). In the game players mine crystals, buy and upgrade spaceships, and participate in real time PvP battles with other players. $ROCKET will be a community-driven token that will be airdropped to players. Every userâ€™s in-game progress will be directly converted into $ROCKET tokens when distributing the airdrop. The token will have utilities in the game, as well as in the broader Whitechain ecosystem.
